exceptions.tactic: intros a b d [Ha [Hb [Hd | [Ha' [Hd' Heq]]]]] [Ha'' [Hb'' [Hd'' | [Ha [Hd Heq']]]]].
intros a''' b d [Ha [Hb [Hd | [Ha' [Hd' Heq]]]]] [Ha'' [Hb'' [Hd'' | [Ha [Hd Heq']]]]].
intros a''' b''' d [Ha [Hb [Hd | [Ha' [Hd' Heq]]]]] [Ha'' [Hb'' [Hd'' | [Ha [Hd Heq']]]]].
intros a''' b''' d''' [Ha [Hb [Hd | [Ha' [Hd' Heq]]]]] [Ha'' [Hb'' [Hd'' | [Ha [Hd Heq']]]]].
intros a''' b''' d''' [Ha''' [Hb [Hd | [Ha' [Hd' Heq]]]]] [Ha'' [Hb'' [Hd'' | [Ha [Hd Heq']]]]].
intros a''' b''' d''' [Ha''' [Hb [Hd''' | [Ha' [Hd' Heq]]]]] [Ha'' [Hb'' [Hd'' | [Ha [Hd Heq']]]]].

original: intros. intros [Hcomm [Hgroup [Hintern [Hassoc Hdist]]]]. intros a b d [Ha [Hb [Hd | [Ha' [Hd' Heq]]]]] [Ha'' [Hb'' [Hd'' | [Ha [Hd Heq']]]]]. - split; split; auto. - right. split; split. + apply Hgroup. apply Ha. apply Ha''. + exists (Mult a (Mult b'' (Opp b))). split; auto. rewrite <- Hintern in Ha''. rewrite <- Hdist. rewrite Hd''. rewrite Heq. rewrite Hd. auto.
